segments.text: I'd like to order room service to room 927 , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to two roast beef sandwiches and one fruit salad , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , could I also get some extra towels and soap too ? We went to the pool today and used up our two clean towels .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll have someone bring that up right away . How would you like to pay for the dinner ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just put it on with the rest of my hotel bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , sir . You should receive your dinner in about ten minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
